name: Dodger (PenjiStudios)
description:
an epic game about dodging colors and numbers

test your hand eye coordination and arithmetic skill to play this fun packed game

instructions for level 1:

catch the squares and circles of the same color of your player, on the top right corner, there is a shape displayed, catch the same shape as the one on the top right and you get extra points

instructions  for level 2:
you will see a mathematical question in the bottom left of your screen, catch the numbers of  your output and hit space to verify, if correct hurray! you get points, if wrong, You loose
